snippet.title: Super Mario Flashback - Loop & Demo
snippet.description:
Ah this fan game seen the old version of it created by Mors and the flashback team, wanted to make a video before but couldn't find the right recording program for it. But man if you seen what it was before then you can see the difference on how this fan game improve. You could see it in the April fools loop build, yes you are going in a big loop, but not only the loop level is randomly generated the sprite animation shows improvement even on small things. If you want to try the loop build and demo build links down below.

Loop Build:
https://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb&param=02&c=2&id=36597

Demo Build:
http://flashback.mors-games.com/
